weapon.name: Molten Shield V2
weapon.description: A shield axe that belongs to the V2 weapon series, a collection of weapons forged with special techniques.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack **4** times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to **77.7%** of ATK plus **466** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **56.9%** of ATK plus **341** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.8%** of ATK plus **377** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **184%** of ATK plus **1104** and **launch the target into the air**.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to **135.2%** of ATK plus **811** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **79.4%** of ATK plus **476** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **119.9%** of ATK plus **719** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **221.3%** of ATK plus **1328** and knock the target back.

normals.name: Aerial Strike
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, attack **3** times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to **75.9%** of ATK plus **455**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **80.2%** of ATK plus **481**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **103%** of ATK plus **618**.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to **118.6%** of ATK plus **712**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **91.1%** of ATK plus **547**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **277.9%** of ATK plus **1667**.

normals.name: Anticipation
normals.description:
Shield Form: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to enter shield form (release to exit) for **3** seconds, during which the Wanderer is unable to move, and all damage taken is reduced by **50%**. While in shield form, releasing the normal attack button after taking damage or after holding the button for **3** seconds unleashes fire crash, dealing damage equal to **167.3%** of ATK plus **1004** and inflicting a **1**-second **stun** effect on the target.
Axe Form: Smash the target, dealing damage equal to **122.2%** of ATK plus **733** and suspending the target.

normals.name: Valor
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger aerial branch attacks.
Shield Form: While falling, deal damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK plus **75** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **89.2%** of ATK plus **535** and suspend the target.
Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK plus **75** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **128.3%** of ATK plus **770** and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

dodge.name: Erupt
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flaming shield, dealing damage equal to **55.8%** of ATK plus **335** and knocking back targets. In addition, trigger an explosion that deals damage equal to **55.8%** of ATK plus **335**, **stun** targets for **0.5** seconds, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by **30%** for **10** seconds.
Axe Form: Swing an axe to deal damage equal to **226.3%** of ATK plus **1358**, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by **30%** for **10** seconds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: **15** seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Fission
skill.description:
Shield Conversion: Switch from shield form to axe form and smash the ground, dealing damage equal to **373.8%** of ATK plus **2243**, plus additional damage equal to **4%** of the Wanderer's Max HP, and **strongly suspending** the target. Leave a large flame zone for **5** seconds that burns the target, dealing continuous damage equal to **233.6%** of ATK plus **1401**.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to **309.5%** of ATK plus **1857** to the target, plus additional damage equal to **4%** of the Wanderer's Max HP, and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for **5** seconds upon being hit.
Cooldown: **25** seconds. Shield Conversion and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.

discharge.name: Seething Rage
discharge.description: When **weapon charge is full** or when **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash a flame shockwave, dealing damage equal to **352%** of ATK plus **2112**, plus additional damage equal to **5%** of the Wanderer's Max HP. Taunt enemies for **5** seconds, during which gain **15%** damage reduction. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted, which last within the area for **20** seconds. Upon pickup, objects provide **10** seconds of **5%** damage reduction (stackable) and immediately restore **1** dodge attempt.

advancements.description: Gain a stack of Strong Shield upon using discharge: Seething Rage. Using a dodge skill or branch skill while in shield form grants a stack of Strong Shield, which grants **10%** damage reduction for **15** seconds and stacks up to **3** times. Switching to axe form converts all Strong Shield stacks to Sharp Axe stacks, each of which increases damage by **15%** for **15** seconds. Switching to a different weapon cancels this effect.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
While in shield form, branch/dodge attacks deal additional damage to targets equal to **4%** of the user's current HP.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

After switching to a shield axe, immediately grant **30%** damage reduction that diminishes by **10%** every **3** seconds, down to a minimum of **10%**. Switching weapons cancels this effect. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

Enhance conversion skills.
Shield Conversion Enhancement: Increases skill damage dealt by **60%** and expands the radius of the flame zone by **30%**.
Axe Conversion Enhancement: Does not share cooldown with Shield Conversion. For the next **5** seconds after using this skill, turns all damage received into HP (up to a maximum of **15%** of the user's Max HP).

matrice.name: Huma
matrice.description: It was the instinct to see the light that led the baby birds out of their shells.

set.set_2: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to **15%**/**19%**/**22.5%**/**26%** of ATK every second for **5** seconds.
set.set_4: Reduce ATK of all targets within **8** meters that are taking damage over time by **10%**/**12%**/**13%**/**15%**. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
